Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. is a privately owned company with over 15 years of experience in the Interlocking and Landscaping industry.  Based out of Milton, Ontario, we are happy to service the West GTA.

Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. is a full-service luxury landscape company with staff that are trained in up to date industry leading practices.  We onboard our teams to instil our company’s expectations of excellence.  The staff go through weekly training sessions to ensure our sales representatives, office admin and skilled labourers have an in depth understanding of their responsibilities to you, the customer.

At Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. we are truly committed to our customers throughout the entire job process.  We take all necessary steps to ensure an enjoyable experience from beginning to end.  We pride ourselves in our dedication to offering the best solution for your driveway, patio and front entrance and in maintaining a premium level of customer service. 

At Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. we have 2 core values; our Customers and the Environment. Not only do we offer the best quality products and services, we are also committed to minimizing our carbon footprint.  We are proud to be the front runners in taking an environmentally friendly approach to a very polluted industry. 

Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. is fully licensed, bonded and insured.  We are equipped with Worker’s Compensation (WSIB) and a $2,000,000 liability insurance policy protecting your personal assets.   Our work is protected by a written two year workmanship warranty that covers all aspects of the project.  All of the products we use are covered by a lifetime guarantee through Canadian based manufacturers.

At Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. we are aiming to innovate the interlocking industry.  We are committed to lead our industry towards a future that is not only cleaner, but is also more environmentally responsible. We take pride in building a better tomorrow for future generations.

Client satisfaction
